/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11    CMakeFiles/opulence.dir/home/champ/Git/crows/main.c.o CMakeFiles/opulence.dir/opulence.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opulence.dir/src/entity/Entity.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opulence.dir/src/loaders/ShaderLoader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opulence.dir/src/entity/model/Model.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opulence.dir/src/loaders/ObjLoader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opulence.dir/src/entity/camera/Camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opulence.dir/src/service/Courier.cpp.o  -o opulence -rdynamic -Wl,-Bstatic -lSDL2main -Wl,-Bdynamic -lSDL2 -lpthread -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lGLEW
